root.name: DoDonPachi Daifukkatsu Black Label
root.description: DoDonPachi Daifukkatsu Black Label is a vertical bullet hell shoot 'em up developed by Cave, and based on 2008's DoDonPachi Daifukkatsu. It was released in arcades January 20, 2010. An Xbox 360 port was released in Japan February 3, 2011, in two different ways: as DLC for DoDonPachi Daifukkatsu 1.5, and as a standalone retail game. The standalone retail version includes a special crossover mode with the stages and enemies of Daifukkatsu, but the player ships and systems from Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi. The DLC version was later released in PAL regions in November 2011.
